reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty, comfortable, and appreciate its true-to-size fit that isn't too long or too short. Moreover, they consider it good value for money and flattering, with one customer noting it works well as a beach coverup. However, the quality and fabric receive mixed reviews, with some finding it great while others report bad quality. Additionally, the sheerness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting the material isn't see-through at all. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer dress
items.body: My daughter wore this to an end of year summer dance. This dress was perfect! Good coverage and sits right above the knee. She was comfortable in it. Well worth the price. Was not wrinkled when I took it out of the package which was a plus. Read more
items.author: Tracey B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good
items.body: The Mansy floral mini dress runs true to size and has a really flattering cut. The fabric is lightweight and breezy - perfect for hot summer days - though it's a bit see-through so you'll want to plan your undergarments accordingly. The ruffled details and adjustable straps help create a nice silhouette without being too fussy. The elastic at the back of the bodice provides good stretch for comfort while keeping everything secure. The skirt portion has enough fullness to move nicely when walking but isn't so voluminous that it becomes impractical. Length hits about mid-thigh on average height (I'm 5'6"). A few practical notes: The fabric wrinkles pretty easily, so you'll want to hang it up right after washing. The built-in lining helps with the sheerness but only extends to mid-thigh. The floral print looks exactly like the photos and hasn't faded after several washes. While it's marketed as a dress, it also works great as a beach coverup. Just keep in mind that this is definitely a casual summer piece - the fabric quality is good for the price point but isn't anything luxurious. Machine washes well on delicate cycle.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ Read more
items.author: CJ

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality
items.body: terrible. The strap broke right away when trying on. Also ends at an awkward length. Read more
items.author: Alejandra Callejas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the beach
items.body: Just as depicted in the picture. Looked so good on me Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: I love this dress if it’s so good so cute so springy. The material isn’t see-through at all. It’s long enough so it won’t show off anything. The size is dead on. I went a size smaller just cause I wanted to tighter fit up top cause I’m smaller chest and it still fit amazing Read more
items.author: Tatum

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars kind of sheer
items.body: i got this to wear for my graduation and have worn it so many times. it is super comfy and the straps stay tied pretty well. it is quite sheer so keep that in mind but overall a super pretty dress. Read more
items.author: anonymous

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Makes you look boxy
items.body: this had so much potential but it ended up being too big around under the arms and making my body seem to look like a square. Also the ruffles don't do anything for you; it made me look bigger than I am (and I am a pretty tiny person). I ordered a small and I am 5'1 and 105 lb and it was too big on me. But actual dress is super cute Read more
items.author: Jeffrey Podell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute dress
items.body: Cute flowy summer dress. Not see through. Great value for the cost. Fit is true to size. Read more
items.author: Chesna S.

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Green, 1-d-blue, Blue Flower, Pink, White Flower, 1purple Yellow, 1-e-pink Flower, Orange Flower, Green Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
